patthana17.19:1.1_0: Kusalo ajjhatto dhammo naajjhattassa nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana17.19:1.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā nava, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, purejāte
patthana17.19:1.1_2: cha, āhāre tīṇi, atthiyā avigate cha.
patthana17.19:2.1_0: Kusalo bahiddhā dhammo nabahiddhā nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana17.19:2.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā pannarasa, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, purejāte
patthana17.19:2.1_2: cha, āhāre tīṇi, atthiyā avigate cha.
patthana17.19:3.1_0: Kusalaṁ ajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati
patthana17.19:3.1_1: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe…
patthana17.19:4.1_0: Kusalaṁ bahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati
patthana17.19:4.1_1: hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe…
